mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEWS_TB VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(REV_NO), 0)+1 FROM REVIEWS_TB), #{orddtPdNo}, #{orddtOrdNo}, #{mbId}, #{revTitle}, #{revWriter}, #{revContent}, #{revGrade}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(REV_NO) FROM REVIEWS_TB WHERE ORDDT_PD_NO=#{pdNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEWS_TB SET REV_TITLE=#{revTitle}, REV_WRITER=#{revWriter}, REV_CONTENT=#{revContent}, REV_GRADE=#{revGrade} WHERE REV_NO=#{revNo}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM REVIEWS_TB WHERE ORDDT_ORD_NO=#{ordNo} AND ORDDT_PD_NO=#{pdNo}
